abstract: Editorial supports Labor Dept proposal to update overtime-pay rules; holds proposal, including plan to raise salary threshold for overtime, would elevate millions of Americans to middle class, right economic imbalances and modernize overtime salaries that have remained same since 1970s; contends no party or politician who opposes overtime reform can truly claim to care about middle class.
lead_paragraph: A Labor Department plan would give millions of American workers a toehold in the middle class by raising the limit to qualify for overtime pay.

headline.main: A Needed Update for Overtime Pay
